The Bess Life

Hi, I am Elizabeth Wittingslow also known as Bess.

Over the past year I have done a lot of reflecting on my life, thinking about all the difficult paths and or mistakes I have made and how now I try to learn from these to ensure positive outcomes are in place to move forward. I have been setting goals that I never thought possible.

I have finally realised my purpose in life is to bring joy and happiness to beautiful souls needing inspiration from this very crazy world.

Tell me who is struggling to find purpose or that light that sets your soul on fire?

Start by reflecting inwards and believing in your self

“Our job in this lifetime is not to shape ourselves into some ideal we imagine we ought to be, but to find out who we already are and become it.”
